trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de criação num designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"> </xref> Web controlo de servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control allows a text string to be used as a control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>controlo permite uma cadeia de texto a ser utilizado como um controlo numa página Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um designer visual, quando muda de origem para a vista de estrutura, o código de origem do markup que descreve um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>controlo é analisado e uma versão de tempo de criação do controlo é criada na superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando voltar a mudar para vista de origem, o controlo de tempo de criação é transferido para o código de origem do markup e editá-lo na marcação de página Web.

trans-unit.source: The LiteralDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de LiteralDesigner fornece suporte de momento da conceção para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a design-time change to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>método é chamado quando existe uma alteração do momento da conceção para associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework constrói internamente uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner>classe quando cria associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>controlo ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>controlo da superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando existe uma alteração para o controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: O método OnComponentChanged é chamado quando a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>eventos de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>controlo é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a `Properties` grid change).
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, trata-se em resposta a uma alteração de propriedade no controlo (por exemplo, um `Properties` alteração de grelha).

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs> object and then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> base method.
trans-unit.target: O OnComponentChanged cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs>objeto e, em seguida, as chamadas a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>base método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que é a origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que contém os dados do evento.
